meanings.sent1: The unimpaired vase sat proudly on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The car's unimpaired engine ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The unimpaired umbrella refused to let a single drop of rain through.
meanings.sent4: Her unimpaired focus allowed her to excel in her studies.
meanings.sent5: The unimpaired bridge stood strong against the raging river.

meanings.sent1: His unimpaired memory recalled every detail of the event.
meanings.sent2: The unimpaired reputation of the company remained untarnished.
meanings.sent3: The unimpaired cookie jar seemed to magically refill itself.
meanings.sent4: The unimpaired bond between the siblings was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The unimpaired star shone brightly in the night sky.
